# framqaqc

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of framqaqc is to streamline the QAQC process for FRAM development.

## Installation

You can install the development version of framqaqc from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("FRAMverse/framqaqc")
```
